content: s cid 415 tches loosely 7 seaming once you have finished the front and the back panels seam the shoulders the s cid 415 tch markers mark the collar do not seam between the markers and the underarms using matress s cid 415 tch cuffs pick up 44 44 st along the cuff edge k2 p2 in the round cid 415 ll the cuffs measures 5 cm /4 / 20 rds bind off thank you for kni cid 427 ng my pa cid 425 ern design i hope you enjoyed this project if you have any ques cid 415 ons or sugges cid 415 ons please let me know on ravelry if you share your project on instagram please let me know using #nyxsweater and tag me @grio cid 425 e_knits so i can see it cid 45492 cid 45490 cid 45493 cid 45494 cid 45495 cid 45491 8
